title: Luxury Residential Villa
description: A stunning 5-bedroom luxury villa with modern amenities, infinity pool, and panoramic city views. Completed in 18 months with premium finishes.

title: Commercial Office Complex
description: State-of-the-art 12-story commercial building with smart office spaces, eco-friendly design, and advanced security systems. LEED Gold certified.

title: Green Valley Apartments
description: Premium residential complex with 200+ units, clubhouse, swimming pool, gym, and landscaped gardens. Family-friendly community living.

title: Phoenix Shopping Mall
description: Massive 5-level shopping and entertainment complex with 300+ retail outlets, multiplex cinema, food court, and parking for 2000+ vehicles. Modern steel and glass architecture.

title: Metro Healthcare Center
description: Ultra-modern 250-bed multi-specialty hospital with advanced ICU, operation theaters, diagnostic center, and emergency services. Equipped with latest medical technology.

title: Future Ready Academy
description: Contemporary educational campus with smart classrooms, science labs, sports facilities, library, and auditorium. Designed for 2000+ students with focus on sustainable architecture.
